SELECT /* WaaRqstAprpMapper.selectapprovebyline */ APR_LVL, USER_ID AS APRV_USER_ID, USER_NM AS APRV_USER_NM, APRG_ID, APR_FRML_CD FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN A.APR_FRML_CD = 'D' THEN A.USER_ID ELSE A.APRG_ID END AS USER_ID , CASE WHEN A.APR_FRML_CD = 'D' THEN B.USER_NM ELSE C.APRG_NM END AS USER_NM , A.APR_LVL , A.SYS_DCD , A.BIZ_DCD , A.APR_FRML_CD , A.APRG_ID , C.APRG_NM , A.ABD_DAPR_DCD , A.SBS_APRP_ID , A.DAPR_STR_DT , A.DAPR_END_DT FROM WAA_RQST_APRP A INNER JOIN WAA_USER B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND B.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAA_APRG C ON A.APRG_ID = C.APRG_ID AND C.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAQ_MSTR M ON A.BIZ_DCD = M.BIZ_DCD AND M.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} WHERE A.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND A.APR_FRML_CD IN ('D','G') ) A GROUP BY APR_LVL, USER_ID, USER_NM, APRG_ID, APR_FRML_CD
ORDER BY 1, 3

SELECT /* WaaRqstAprpMapper.selectapprovebylineUser */ A.APR_LVL , B.USER_ID AS APRV_USER_ID , B.USER_NM AS APRV_USER_NM , C.APRG_ID , A.APR_FRML_CD , B.JIKWI_NM , B.PART_NM , B.TEAM_NM FROM WAA_RQST_BIZ_APR A INNER JOIN (SELECT B.USER_ID , B.USER_NM , B.APRV_AUTH_CD , B.JIKWI_NM , B.PART_NM , B.TEAM_NM FROM WAA_USER B WHERE B.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND B.PART_NM IN (SELECT PART_NM FROM WAA_USER X WHERE X.USER_ID = #{writUserId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) ) B ON 1 = 1 INNER JOIN WAA_APRG C ON C.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND C.APRG_ID = A.APRG_ID INNER JOIN WAQ_MSTR M ON A.BIZ_DCD = M.BIZ_DCD AND M.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE A.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND A.APR_FRML_CD = 'T' AND CAST(C.APRG_RNK AS UNSIGNED) >= CAST(B.APRV_AUTH_CD AS UNSIGNED)
AND B.USER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{aprvUserNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND B.TEAM_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{teamNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
ORDER BY 1, 3

SELECT /* WaaRqstAprpMapper.selectapprovebylineUserJ */ A.APR_LVL , B.USER_ID AS APRV_USER_ID , B.USER_NM AS APRV_USER_NM , C.APRG_ID , A.APR_FRML_CD , B.JIKWI_NM , B.PART_NM , B.TEAM_NM FROM WAA_RQST_BIZ_APR A INNER JOIN ( SELECT A.USER_ID ,A.USER_NM ,'J' AS APR_FRML_CD ,POSITION AS JIKWI_CODE ,A.JIKWI_NM ,A.PART_NM ,A.TEAM_NM FROM WAA_USER A WHERE A.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') )B ON A.APR_FRML_CD = B.APR_FRML_CD JOIN WAA_APRG C ON A.APRG_ID = C.APRG_ID AND C.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND CAST(C.APRG_RNK AS UNSIGNED) = CAST(B.JIKWI_CODE AS UNSIGNED) JOIN WAQ_MSTR M ON A.BIZ_DCD = M.BIZ_DCD AND M.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} WHERE A.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND A.APR_FRML_CD='J' AND EXISTS (
SELECT 1 FROM WAA_USER T WHERE T.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND T.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND T.USER_ID=#{writUserId} AND CAST(C.APRG_RNK AS UNSIGNED) > CAST(IFNULL(T.POSITION,'90') AS UNSIGNED) )
AND B.USER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{aprvUserNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND B.TEAM_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{teamNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
ORDER BY 1, 3
